message.body: Hey John! How are you? I feel like we haven't talked in forever. I miss yah!
Hey Sam. I'm busy (as usual...), but good otherwise. I'm going to a farewell party being held for a friend's friend's friend in about 30 minutes.
How are you doing? Teaching a new batch of kids?
Glad you're well! Hope you have fun at your friend's friend's friend's party, lol. I'm a little stressed but okay. The school year starts on Monday and n
ot one of the interviews I had panned out into a full-time job. So now I'm probably going to have to switch back to subbing...
That's tough. Are you still going to school at the same time?
Yeah, but I'm only taking one class right now. It's all I can afford without any loans... >_>
Do you have any subbing gigs set up already?
I have the one and I asked 2 other schools, so I'm waiting for them to get back to me. A friend recommended another one I can try so I have to e-mail them too.
